topic.title: Show Comments and Tracked Changes in DocBook 5 PDF Output

keywords.indexterm: DocBookOutputPDF output customizationShow comments and tracked changes
DocBookPDF output customizationShow comments and tracked changes

body.p: To include comments and tracked changes (stored within your DocBook 5 documents) in the PDF output, follow these steps:

ol.li: Click the Configure Transformation Scenario(s) button.
Select DocBook PDF (Show Change Tracking and Comments) in the DocBook 5 section.
If you need to configure the transformation, click the Edit or Duplicate button, make your changes to the scenario, and click OK.

Click the Apply Associated button to run the transformation scenario.
Result: Comment threads and tracked changes will now appear in the PDF output. Details about each comment or change will be available in the footer section for each page.
